title: What the hell did you do to Veigar?
body:
Jesus christ, you ruined him, why is their a delay on his ability that he uses to set up his W, I like the Q but the delay on his E just fucks him, he used to hardcounter Katarina, now she fucks everyone. Not only that, but anyone who countered him now hard counters him and the people who hardcountered him now stomp on him.

I do like that people cant flash outta his E but fuck sake, that 1s delay is to much. Idk why you hit Veigar before Annie.

replies.body: because his e was the reason he was being picked as a support.
Idc what happens to Veigar...I want Annie to the ground, further than Kassadin..
